text: Locksport is a hobby and sport that involves the practice of lock picking, disassembling, and understanding locks for recreational and educational purposes. People who do this are called lock pickers or locksport enthusiasts. Locksport is allowed when done on their locks or with permission. Some communities often host competitions, known as lockpicking contests, where participants race to open locks as quickly as possible. Category:Locks
title: Locksport
